content.question: An important result of the 1936 presidential campaign was the

choices.label: emergence of a viable third party
landslide win by Republicans in the Congress
shift of African American voters from the Republican Party to the Democratic Party
move of intellectuals to Alf Landon and the Republican ticket
decline in support for the New Deal

content.answer: shift of African American voters from the Republican Party to the Democratic Party

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
